channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #89 – Coronium Analytics, oSnap Selfie App, and Music Apps

item.title: By: Antheor
item.dc:creator: Antheor
item.description: I knew that, it's just that the correct cut for a good loop in the edition part is clumsy. But thx for the reply.
item.content:encoded: I knew that, it’s just that the correct cut for a good loop in the edition part is clumsy. But thx for the reply.

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Hi Antheor, I recommend exporting to Sound Cloud, which will then turn your audio into an MP3. You can download the audio file from there and edit as needed.
item.content:encoded: Hi Antheor, I recommend exporting to Sound Cloud, which will then turn your audio into an MP3. You can download the audio file from there and edit as needed.

item.title: By: Antheor
item.dc:creator: Antheor
item.description: The figure example is a good one. I tried to do so but I had some issues exporting my samples : there's always a cut a the end and it doesn't loop correctly. How did you do ?
item.content:encoded: The figure example is a good one. I tried to do so but I had some issues exporting my samples : there’s always a cut a the end and it doesn’t loop correctly. How did you do ?
